[vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Hourly fee

Neutral Evaluation fees range from $250 to $750 plus HST per hour, depending on the experience of the neutral.

 

Administrative Fees

In addition to the Evaluator’s fee, there is a fixed and non-refundable administrative fee of $500 plus HST for the administration of the Neutral Evaluation.

The room fee to conduct a neutral evaluation at ADR Chambers’ North York office is $750 plus HST. A hearing room and two breakout rooms are provided for this fee. Additional rooms are $400 plus HST each. Coffee, tea, cold drinks, and snacks are provided. Lunch, if requested, is billed at cost.

Cancellations/Adjournments, Fees and Disbursements

All Neutral Evaluations cancelled or adjourned fewer than ten business days prior to the commencement of the Neutral Evaluation date will be subject to a cancellation fee of the amount required for deposit.

Any adjournment of a Neutral Evaluation on consent of the parties or an adjournment required due to a position taken by one or more of the parties shall be deemed to be a cancellation and subject to the cancellation fee.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”hidden-print”][vc_btn title=”Request a Neutral Evaluation” style=”custom” custom_background=”#dd0046″ custom_text=”#ffffff” shape=”square” align=”center” i_icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-calendar” button_block=”true” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fadrchambers.com%2Frequest-a-neutral%2F|||”][vc_custom_heading text=”Neutral Evaluation” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”menu-header”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”74″][vc_custom_heading text=”Other ADR Services” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”menu-header”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”66″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
